body_content.explanation: a teacher who has responsibility for the children in a school who have special needs (= who need special care because of an illness or condition that makes it difficult for them to do the things that other people do):
examples: She is head of learning support and special educational needs co-ordinator at Nailsea School.
As your son is struggling with schoolwork, it would be a good idea to talk to his teacher and the school's special educational needs co-ordinator.
